amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to transfer or divest the Electronic Proving Grounds at Fort Huachuca, Arizona.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to transfer or divest the Electronic Proving Grounds at Fort Huachuca, Arizona.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A079) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 248 (Roll no. 336).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A079) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 248 (Roll no. 336).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A079) offered by Mr. Franks (AZ).
